meanings.definition: A type of tree or shrub with fragrant white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The yulan in our garden smells so sweet.
meanings.sent2: I love the delicate petals of the yulan tree.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the yulan in bloom.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter floated through the air like the scent of a yulan.
meanings.sent5: The yulan's blossoms danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The fragrant white or pink flowers of the yulan tree.
meanings.sent1: The yulan blossoms brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful yulan in her hair.
meanings.sent3: The yulan petals fell like confetti at the wedding.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as lovely as a yulan in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the yulan filled the entire garden.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Yulan greeted us warmly at the door.
meanings.sent2: Yulan's family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent3: Yulan's signature dish is always a hit at potlucks.
meanings.sent4: The name Yulan means 'magnolia' in Chinese.
meanings.sent5: Yulan's calligraphy is admired by all who see it.
